articles.author: Jamie Woodhouse
articles.title: McLaren teases concept change as they ask has design reached its 'pinnacle'? - Planet F1
articles.description: Looking ahead to next season, McLaren believe they must open up fresh areas for development if they are to catch the top teams.
articles.content:
After McLaren brought upgrades to Hungary, technical director James Key is wary of any potential development ceiling to their car concept.
McLaren initially played it relatively safe with their 2022… [+4284 chars]
